welcome_message_body: Welcome to Parnamirim, Brazil! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's vibrant culture, beautiful beaches, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Parnamirim has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Augusto Severo Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights and charter planes.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
